query: select * from json_populate_recordset(row(1000000000::int,50::int),'[{"b":"2"},{"a":"3"}]') q (a text, b text)
expected: SELECT * FROM json_populate_recordset(ROW(CAST(1000000000 AS INT), CAST(50 AS INT)), '[{"b":"2"},{"a":"3"}]') AS q

query: INSERT INTO jspoptest SELECT '{ "jsa": [1, "2", null, 4], "rec": {"a": "abc", "c": "01.02.2003", "x": 43.2}, "reca": [{"a": "abc", "b": 456}, null, {"c": "01.02.2003", "x": 43.2}] }'::json FROM generate_series(1, 3)
expected: INSERT INTO jspoptest SELECT CAST('{ "jsa": [1, "2", null, 4], "rec": {"a": "abc", "c": "01.02.2003", "x": 43.2}, "reca": [{"a": "abc", "b": 456}, null, {"c": "01.02.2003", "x": 43.2}] }' AS JSON) FROM generate_series(1, 3)
SELECT (json_populate_record(CAST(NULL AS jsrec), js)).* FROM jspoptest

query: select value, json_typeof(value) from (values (json '123.4'), (json '-1'), (json '"foo"'), (json 'true'), (json 'false'), (json 'null'), (json '[1, 2, 3]'), (json '[]'), (json '{"x":"foo", "y":123}'), (json '{}'), (NULL::json)) as data(value)
expected: SELECT value, json_typeof(value) FROM (VALUES (CAST('123.4' AS JSON)), (CAST('-1' AS JSON)), (CAST('"foo"' AS JSON)), (CAST('true' AS JSON)), (CAST('false' AS JSON)), (CAST('null' AS JSON)), (CAST('[1, 2, 3]' AS JSON)), (CAST('[]' AS JSON)), (CAST('{"x":"foo", "y":123}' AS JSON)), (CAST('{}' AS JSON)), (CAST(NULL AS JSON))) AS data(value)
SELECT json_build_array('a', 1, 'b', 1.2, 'c', TRUE, 'd', NULL, 'e', CAST('{"x": 3, "y": [1,2,3]}' AS JSON))
SELECT json_build_object('a', 1, 'b', 1.2, 'c', TRUE, 'd', NULL, 'e', CAST('{"x": 3, "y": [1,2,3]}' AS JSON))

query: SELECT json_build_object( 'a', json_build_object('b',false,'c',99), 'd', json_build_object('e',array[9,8,7]::int[], 'f', (select row_to_json(r) from ( select relkind, oid::regclass as name from pg_class where relname = 'pg_class') r)))
expected: SELECT json_build_object('a', json_build_object('b', FALSE, 'c', 99), 'd', json_build_object('e', CAST(ARRAY[9,8,7] AS INT[]), 'f', (SELECT row_to_json(r) FROM (SELECT relkind, CAST(oid AS regclass) AS name FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'pg_class') AS r)))
SELECT json_build_object(CAST('{a,b,c}' AS TEXT[]), CAST('{d,e,f}' AS TEXT[]))

query: SELECT json_build_object(r,2) FROM (SELECT 1 AS a, 2 AS b) r
expected: SELECT json_build_object(r, 2) FROM (SELECT 1 AS a, 2 AS b) AS r

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE foo (serial_num int, name text, type text)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE foo (serial_num INT, name TEXT, type TEXT)
SELECT json_build_object('turbines', json_object_agg(serial_num, json_build_object('name', name, 'type', type))) FROM foo

query: SELECT json_object('{a,1,b,2,3,NULL,"d e f","a b c"}')
SELECT json_object('{{a,1},{b,2},{3,NULL},{"d e f","a b c"}}')
select json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f"}','{1,2,3,"a b c"}')
expected: SELECT json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f"}', '{1,2,3,"a b c"}')

query: SELECT json_object('{{a,1},{b,2},{3,NULL},{"d e f","a b c"}}', '{{a,1},{b,2},{3,NULL},{"d e f","a b c"}}')
select json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f",g}','{1,2,3,"a b c"}')
expected: SELECT json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f",g}', '{1,2,3,"a b c"}')

query: select json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f"}','{1,2,3,"a b c",g}')
expected: SELECT json_object('{a,b,c,"d e f"}', '{1,2,3,"a b c",g}')

query: select json_object('{a,b,NULL,"d e f"}','{1,2,3,"a b c"}')
expected: SELECT json_object('{a,b,NULL,"d e f"}', '{1,2,3,"a b c"}')

query: select json_object('{a,b,"","d e f"}','{1,2,3,"a b c"}')
expected: SELECT json_object('{a,b,"","d e f"}', '{1,2,3,"a b c"}')

query: select json_object_agg_unique(mod(i,100), i) from generate_series(0, 199) i
expected: SELECT json_object_agg_unique(mod(i, 100), i) FROM generate_series(0, 199) AS i

query: select * from json_to_record('{"a":1,"b":"foo","c":"bar"}') as x(a int, b text, d text)
select * from json_to_recordset('[{"a":1,"b":"foo","d":false},{"a":2,"b":"bar","c":true}]') as x(a int, b text, c boolean)
select * from json_to_recordset('[{"a":1,"b":{"d":"foo"},"c":true},{"a":2,"c":false,"b":{"d":"bar"}}]') as x(a int, b json, c boolean)

select *, c is null as c_is_null from json_to_record('{"a":1, "b":{"c":16, "d":2}, "x":8, "ca": ["1 2", 3], "ia": [[1,2],[3,4]], "r": {"a": "aaa", "b": 123}}'::json) as t(a int, b json, c text, x int, ca char(5)[], ia int[][], r jpop)
expected: SELECT *, c IS NULL AS c_is_null FROM json_to_record(CAST('{"a":1, "b":{"c":16, "d":2}, "x":8, "ca": ["1 2", 3], "ia": [[1,2],[3,4]], "r": {"a": "aaa", "b": 123}}' AS JSON)) AS t

query: select *, c is null as c_is_null from json_to_recordset('[{"a":1, "b":{"c":16, "d":2}, "x":8}]'::json) as t(a int, b json, c text, x int)
expected: SELECT *, c IS NULL AS c_is_null FROM json_to_recordset(CAST('[{"a":1, "b":{"c":16, "d":2}, "x":8}]' AS JSON)) AS t

query: select * from json_to_record('{"ia": null}') as x(ia _int4)
expected: SELECT * FROM json_to_record('{"ia": null}') AS x

query: select * from json_to_record('{"ia": [1, "2", null, 4]}') as x(ia _int4)
expected: SELECT * FROM json_to_record('{"ia": [1, "2", null, 4]}') AS x

query: select * from json_to_record('{"ia2": [1, 2, 3]}') as x(ia2 int[][])
select * from json_to_record('{"ia2": [[1, 2], [3, 4]]}') as x(ia2 int4[][])
select * from json_to_record('{"ia2": [[[1], [2], [3]]]}') as x(ia2 int4[][])
select * from json_to_record('{"out": {"key": 1}}') as x(out json)
select * from json_to_record('{"out": [{"key": 1}]}') as x(out json)
select * from json_to_record('{"out": "{\"key\": 1}"}') as x(out json)
select * from json_to_record('{"out": {"key": 1}}') as x(out jsonb)
select * from json_to_record('{"out": [{"key": 1}]}') as x(out jsonb)
select * from json_to_record('{"out": "{\"key\": 1}"}') as x(out jsonb)
select to_tsvector('{"a": "aaa bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh iii"}}'::json)
expected: SELECT to_tsvector(CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh iii"}}' AS JSON))

query: select to_tsvector('simple', '{"a": "aaa bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh iii"}}'::json)
expected: SELECT to_tsvector('simple', CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh iii"}}' AS JSON))

query: select to_tsvector('english', '{"a": "aaa in bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["the eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh. iii"}}'::json)
expected: SELECT to_tsvector('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa in bbb ddd ccc", "b": ["the eee fff ggg"], "c": {"d": "hhh. iii"}}' AS JSON))

query: select to_tsvector('english', '{"a": "aaa in bbb ddd ccc", "b": 123, "c": 456}'::json)
expected: SELECT to_tsvector('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa in bbb ddd ccc", "b": 123, "c": 456}' AS JSON))

query: select json_to_tsvector('english', '{"a": "aaa in bbb", "b": 123, "c": 456, "d": true, "f": false, "g": null}'::json, '"all"')
expected: SELECT json_to_tsvector('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa in bbb", "b": 123, "c": 456, "d": true, "f": false, "g": null}' AS JSON), '"all"')

query: select json_to_tsvector('english', '{"a": "aaa in bbb", "b": 123, "c": 456, "d": true, "f": false, "g": null}'::json, '"key"')
expected: SELECT json_to_tsvector('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa in bbb", "b": 123, "c": 456, "d": true, "f": false, "g": null}' AS JSON), '"key"')

query: select ts_headline('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}'::json, tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'))
expected: SELECT ts_headline(CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}' AS JSON), tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'))

query: select ts_headline('english', '{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}'::json, tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'))
expected: SELECT ts_headline('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}' AS JSON), tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'))

query: select ts_headline('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}'::json, tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'), 'StartSel = <, StopSel = >')
expected: SELECT ts_headline(CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}' AS JSON), tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'), 'StartSel = <, StopSel = >')

query: select ts_headline('english', '{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}'::json, tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'), 'StartSel = <, StopSel = >')
expected: SELECT ts_headline('english', CAST('{"a": "aaa bbb", "b": {"c": "ccc ddd fff", "c1": "ccc1 ddd1"}, "d": ["ggg hhh", "iii jjj"]}' AS JSON), tsquery('bbb & ddd & hhh'), 'StartSel = <, StopSel = >')
SELECT ts_headline(CAST('null' AS JSON), tsquery('aaa & bbb'))
SELECT ts_headline(CAST('{}' AS JSON), tsquery('aaa & bbb'))
SELECT ts_headline(CAST('[]' AS JSON), tsquery('aaa & bbb'))
